mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PAY_USER C WHERE C.PAY_M_UID = A.PAY_M_UID) AS PAY_USER_COUNT FROM PAY_MASTER A ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE PAY_MASTER SET PAY_TITLE = #{pay_title}, ONE_PLACE = #{one_place}, ONE_AMOUNT = #{one_amount}, TWO_PLACE = #{two_place}, TWO_AMOUNT = #{two_amount}, TRE_PLACE = #{tre_place}, TRE_AMOUNT = #{tre_amount}, FOR_PLACE = #{for_place}, FOR_AMOUNT = #{for_amount}, FIV_PLACE = #{fiv_place}, FIV_AMOUNT = #{fiv_amount}, NO = #{no}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = DECODE(#{total_amount}, 0 , ONE_AMOUNT + TWO_AMOUNT + TRE_AMOUNT + FOR_AMOUNT + FIV_AMOUNT, #{total_amount}) WHERE PAY_M_UID = #{pay_m_uid}
